attributes.action: Stop age discrimination on minimum wage
attributes.additional_details: We want to stop age discrimination and equal minimum wage for all ages
attributes.background: To make minimum wage equal for all ages because its not fair for a young fit person to earn such a low income. Whereas a older person gets more for the same job role. It’s unfair

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600960
